item.source: Evil Fuzzles Beyond The Stars Script!

item.title: Evil Fuzzles Beyond The Stars Script!
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

sdcit:

Lolz, when i ried to make one, i made it click every single point on the screen :P. Didn’t work.

That’s cause you’re a NOOB.

Seriously though, use bitmaps on this and you’ll get a kudos and rep+ from me. For buying screen you can just use coords - the buttons don’t change position.

In regards to mine not stopping - it stops to buy, and then it starts again after it’s made its purchases. It USED to stop when the game was over, but I guess Neopets changed something or I removed that code in earlier versions 'cause it was broken. As long as it still plays the game successfully though I’m not going to fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: Evil Fuzzles Beyond The Stars Script!
item.dc:creator: @sdcit sdcit
item.description:
@sdcit wrote:

Lolz, when i ried to make one, i made it click every single point on the screen :P. Didn’t work.

  1. Use a smaller bitmap with tolerance, though that may not work depending on color change, dunno if they changed the range or not. I remember it was huge back then.

  2. A bitmap with a crazy tolerance may be used if it is distinct to the buying screen i think

item.title: Evil Fuzzles Beyond The Stars Script!
item.dc:creator: @sslleeaakkiinngg sslleeaakkiinngg
item.description:
@sslleeaakkiinngg wrote:

Here it is,I am working on the easy games first,then I will make scripts for the hard ones.Here is the script:
[scar]////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// By:SSlleeaakkiinngg. //
// Type:Evil Fuzzles Beyond The Stars. //
// This is my third script. //
// Please comment on this. //
// Hope you enjoy it! //
// Works on any. //
// //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////
program fuzzles;
var x,y:integer;
procedure shootthem;
begin
clickmouse(1112,395,true);
clickmouse(490,348,true);
sleep(25);
clickmouse(643,414,true);
clickmouse(496,504,true);
sleep(25);
clickmouse(640,336,true);
clickmouse(753,352,true);
sleep(25);
clickmouse(430,203,true);
clickmouse(263,323,true);
sleep(25);
clickmouse(669,217,true);
wait(12);//pause the script until it gets to the end,then buy whatever then restart it
end;
begin
repeat
shootthem;
until(getcolor(x,y)=198);//to send-score
end.[/scar][br][size=1]Posted at: September 17, 2006, 06:28:39 PM[/size][hr]Please reply if you use the script by the way.

Read full topic
